CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.Id = "012i0000000tLTf" , IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Declined_Passed__c )), "Declined / Passed", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( E_Y_NRL_Executed__c)), "E&Y NRL Executed", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Sent_E_Y_NRL__c)), "Sent E&Y NRL", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Had_Diligence_Call__c )), "Diligence Call", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Sent_BCG_Report__c)), "Sent BCG Report", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( NRL_Status__c)), "NRL Status", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( BCG_NRL_Executed__c)), "BCG NRL Executed", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Sent_BCG_NRL__c)), "Sent BCG NRL", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Sent_Book__c)), "Sent Book", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Executed_Confidentiality_Agreement__c)), "Executed CA", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Negotiate_Confidentiality_Agreement__c)), "Negotiate NDA", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Confidentiality_Agreement__c )), "Sent CA", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Initial_Contact__c )), "Initial Contact", "No Status" ))))))))))))), "No Status")
CustomField.label: Status (Cap Markets)
